publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-145 Mr Brian Monteith: Scottish History—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward proposals for the introduction of a standard grade exam in Scottish history covering the period from ancient times through to the present day. Supported by: Alex Fergusson*
S1M-145 Scottish History (lodged on 10 September 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Smith*

S1M-145 Mr Brian Monteith: Scottish History—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward proposals for the introduction of a standard grade exam in Scottish history covering the period from ancient times through to the present day. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mrs Margaret Smith, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-145 Scottish History (lodged on 10 September 1999) Linda Fabiani*
